name: Scribble Scrabble
description:
A tower defense game about  CLASSIFIED,LONG LIVE THE ERASERS. . Made in 5 days during Scribble Jam.

how to play: 

Defend your tower! Upgrade! Buy more space, add more floors to your tower, place turrets to strategic locations, or even build a second or third tower! Unlock stronger weapons as you survive harder waves! But can you defeat the boss? And what will be the fate of the pencil race?
controls:

Left Mouse Button - Use to buy and build you tower components

Right Mouse Button - Exit Build Mode

Mouse  Wheel - Zoom in and out

install instructions: Download the zip file, extract it, and click on Scribble Jam 2021.exe to play!
